term.title: gradual (sudden) potential-energy surface

item.text: These terms relate to the steepness of the energy rise along the reaction path of a potential-energy surface.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 149. 'A glossary of terms used in chemical kinetics, including reaction dynamics (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 167 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668010149)
